body_html:
Got significantly farther this time. Turns out the CXX & C unknown error was due to a modification I made earlier (the notorious OOM bug when building tensorflow) to make tensorflow compile. A clean install of VS 2017 fixed that for me. Still failed due to missing TH.h.

Edit 1: Also there was a warning Automatic GPU detection failed. Building for common architectures.

Log attached below:

Got significantly farther this time. Turns out the CXX & C unknown error was due to a modification I made earlier (the notorious OOM bug when building tensorflow) to make tensorflow compile. A clean install of VS 2017 fixed that for me. Still failed due to missing TH.h.
Edit 1: Also there was a warning Automatic GPU detection failed. Building for common architectures.

body:
Got significantly farther this time. Turns out the CXX & C unknown error was due to a modification I made earlier (the notorious OOM bug when building tensorflow) to make tensorflow compile. A clean install of VS 2017 fixed that for me. Still failed due to missing `TH.h`.

Edit 1: Also there was a warning `Automatic GPU detection failed. Building for common architectures.`
